'''2.1.11312''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.11314''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), or '''2.1.11318''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on January 24, 2020.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-12493}} – Launcher shows a warning when first trying to download a new version of the asset index
* {{bug|MCL-12853}} – <samp>launcher_log.txt</samp> takes up a lot of space on disk
